#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int lli;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m,k;
        cin>>n>>m>>k;
        int arr[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            arr[i] = 0;
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
                char ch;
                cin>>ch;
                if(ch == '*')
                    arr[i]++;
            }
        }
        // we are counting off buttons.
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        for(int i=0;i<n && k>0;i++)
        {
            if(2*arr[i]<m)
            {
                arr[i] = m-arr[i];
                k--;
            }
            else
                break;
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        k=k%2;
        if(k)
            arr[0] = m - arr[0];
        long long int sum = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            sum+=arr[i];
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
